idea:
The VC Venture is a one-stop solution for start-ups dedicated to provide high-quality business solutions and strategies in a comfortable atmosphere for clients who seek funds for their start-ups with the help of our Investors.

We intend to make enough profit to generate a fair return for our investors and to finance continued growth and development through our quality services. We also maintain a friendly, fair, and creative work environment, which respects diversity, new ideas, and hard work.
name: THE VC VENTURE LLP

idea: We are brokers of banks and private finance and give loans to the customer from bank DSA and all.
name: Mek Finance Solution

idea:
COMPANY OVERVIEW

RTCom Systems India Private Limited is established in January 2020 with its office in Mumbai. The firm currently has 4+ staff which is internationally accredited engineering and project management specialists.


Main focus areas include:

• Command and Control

• Maritime

• Communication

• Intelligence

• National Security

• Optimizing Ports Efficiency


Programs we are experts in:

• Providing advanced technological solutions

• Offering End-to-End project implementation

• Operational projects in complex environments

• Engaging Best of Breed Technology Partners

• Comprehensive Procedures and Support Services


Our group company has a solid track record across diverse projects:

• Presidential Command

• Coastal Surveillance

• Port Infrastructure (Revenue, Operations, Security, Safety)

• National Information Systems

• Engagement ranges are General to Mega


OUR OFFERINGS

RTCom Systems India Private Limited has expertise in a wide range of areas:


Value Added Services

• On-site operational support and management

• Training and skills development

• Response management

• Asset tracking and logistics Security and Encryption

• Database Encryption

• Communication Services Encryption

• Security Apps for Mobile Communication

• Intelligence Security Management System

• Portal Development Security & Surveillance

• Video / Electro-optical systems surveillance

• Video and Data warehousing

• Data fusion

• Analytics and command

• Integrity Management

• Content fusion and processing Fusion Systems

• Correlation Services

• Intelligence Coordination

• Virtualization Applications

• Artificial Intelligence (AI)


Support Systems

• Power solutions including solar power for communication support

• Data centers, NOC*, RCC*, MOC*

• Fiber, Radio, Microwave and Cellular and Satellite Systems * NOC: Network Operation Center, RCC: Regional Command Center, MOC: Master Operations Center


OUR VALUE PROPOSITION

• Layered employment creation

• Sustainability

• Local content

• Up-skilling the workforce

• Total Cost of Ownership and Resource Optimization

• End-to-End Accountability
name: RTCom Systems India Private Limited

idea:
Not Just Digital Marketing,

But Digital TRANSFORMATION


In today’s digital age, Digital Transformation is not optional, it is essential. If you don’t have a strong online and digital presence, you don’t just risk falling behind, you risk total extinction.


MAGNAREVO is a digital marketing agency that can bring digital transformation to your business through solid strategy, market intelligence and a creative spark. We specialise in providing comprehensive end-to-end digital marketing solutions for your brand, from design and strategy to content and analytics.
name: MAGNAREVO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: igrenEnergi is a well funded deep-tech start-up focused on EV batteries that enable mass adoption of Electric Vehicles. Our first product, revolutionizes 3 & 2 wheeler EV batteries by using patented innovations in Power-Electronics & Cloud-AI/ML
name: igrenEnergi Services Private Limited

idea:
CEO CABS is a Web & Smartphone App that efficiently matches drivers with passengers who need a ride. Whether you are a car driver that wants the most efficient way to get a passenger & more earnings, a car owner that wants to fund your dreams or simply offset costs of your car and help out the community to get rides around town - CEO CABS is the partner for you.

• We working since long time with approx 2 Lac Cars & Drivers

• All brand & type cars in our platform with cheapest rates.

• 3000+ Picking locations around the India

 Our sole purpose is to provide doorstep service for any car rental requirements for local or outstation. It was a humble starts with just one car in 1997. Now at present time we have more than 2 Lac cars & drivers in pan India. It is also the company to have an Online Advanced Technology booking & other Systems, where in customer can chat as well call the driver through an application itself.
name: CHUZONE TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Vitamin D Communications LLP shall carry out activities relating to Design and Innovation Consulting, Digital Media Marketing and Production involving content design, films, advertisements, pre-production, and post-production of video (media), mobile and internet; including ideating, developing, producing, promoting, participating, collaborating and executing content at national and international levels. LLP shall engage, book or hire artists, authors, story writers, musicians, models, performers and other persons from technical and non-technical
name: VITAMIN D COMMUNICATIONS LLP
